name: Paradise Lofts
description:
PARADISE LOFTS is a slow-burning, noir, hardcore sex romp, set in the fictitious town of Paradise in 1958. The story begins as our hero moves into his new apartment, eager to kickstart his new career and new life with his girlfriend, Penny.

The only problem is, you're fired on your first day moving in, and your girlfriend dumps you. As you struggle to find work and meet new people, you are thrust into mystery and mayhem, after witnessing the murder of a neighbor.

An open world environment allows you to develop new skills as you progress through the game, eventually working your way to becoming the most sought-after private dick in Paradise.

It's a world filled with models and wannabe actresses, mobsters and corrupt politicians. Chapter One contains approximately 8 – 12 hours of gameplay, with non-linear story-telling and multiple ways to solve puzzles and get past challenges. Replaying allows players to experience subtle to significant differences in game play and challenges. Shag everyone or shag no one, play it as you like. This visual novel game is filled with mini-games, adventures, and over-the-top comedy galore.

Best played with a mouse or trackball.


  • 8 - 12 hours of game play in this Part I of a 3-part series
  • No excessive grinding
  • Multiple types of mini-games
  • Ability to skip almost any challenge and move forward with the story
  • Over 4,000 pieces of art and over 100 animations
  • Plenty of easter eggs to discover
